trans-unit.source: The transition scenario defines the option you choose for the migration from your SAP Business Suite system to <pname conkeyref="loiob430775feaca45b7b4a868915c73b512/SAP-S4HANA"/>.

seg-source.mrk: The transition scenario defines the option you choose for the migration from your SAP Business Suite system to <pname conkeyref="loiob430775feaca45b7b4a868915c73b512/SAP-S4HANA"/>.

target.mrk: 过渡场景定义您针对从 SAP Business Suite 系统到 <pname conkeyref="loiob430775feaca45b7b4a868915c73b512/SAP-S4HANA"/> 的迁移选择的选项。

trans-unit.source: You can choose one of the following options:

seg-source.mrk: You can choose one of the following options:

trans-unit.source: <uicontrol>System Conversion</uicontrol> for converting an <emphasis>existing</emphasis> SAP system to <pname conkeyref="loiob430775feaca45b7b4a868915c73b512/SAP-S4HANA"/>

seg-source.mrk: <uicontrol>System Conversion</uicontrol> for converting an <emphasis>existing</emphasis> SAP system to <pname conkeyref="loiob430775feaca45b7b4a868915c73b512/SAP-S4HANA"/>

target.mrk: <uicontrol>系统转换</uicontrol>，用于将<emphasis>现有</emphasis> SAP 系统转换为 <pname conkeyref="loiob430775feaca45b7b4a868915c73b512/SAP-S4HANA"/>

trans-unit.source: If this option is selected and usage data is applied, all productively used customer code is automatically considered as <uicontrol>In Scope</uicontrol> by default. This means, all <emphasis>productively used</emphasis> custom code is migrated to <pname conkeyref="loiob430775feaca45b7b4a868915c73b512/SAP-S4HANA"/>.

seg-source.mrk: If this option is selected and usage data is applied, all productively used customer code is automatically considered as <uicontrol>In Scope</uicontrol> by default.
This means, all <emphasis>productively used</emphasis> custom code is migrated to <pname conkeyref="loiob430775feaca45b7b4a868915c73b512/SAP-S4HANA"/>.

target.mrk: 缺省情况下，如果选择此选项并应用使用数据，会自动将所有高效使用的客户代码视为<uicontrol>在范围内</uicontrol>。
这意味着，所有<emphasis>高效使用的</emphasis>自定义代码都会迁移到 <pname conkeyref="loiob430775feaca45b7b4a868915c73b512/SAP-S4HANA"/>。

trans-unit.source: If this option is selected and <emphasis>no</emphasis> usage data is applied, <emphasis>all</emphasis> customer code is considered as <uicontrol>In Scope</uicontrol>. This means, <emphasis>all</emphasis> custom code is migrated to <pname conkeyref="loiob430775feaca45b7b4a868915c73b512/SAP-S4HANA"/>.

seg-source.mrk: If this option is selected and <emphasis>no</emphasis> usage data is applied, <emphasis>all</emphasis> customer code is considered as <uicontrol>In Scope</uicontrol>.
This means, <emphasis>all</emphasis> custom code is migrated to <pname conkeyref="loiob430775feaca45b7b4a868915c73b512/SAP-S4HANA"/>.

target.mrk: 如果选择此选项且<emphasis>未</emphasis>应用使用数据，则会将<emphasis>所有</emphasis>客户代码视为<uicontrol>在范围内</uicontrol>。
这意味着，<emphasis>所有</emphasis>自定义代码都会迁移到 <pname conkeyref="loiob430775feaca45b7b4a868915c73b512/SAP-S4HANA"/>。

trans-unit.source: <uicontrol>New Implementation</uicontrol> for using a new <pname conkeyref="loiob430775feaca45b7b4a868915c73b512/SAP-S4HANA"/> system in which you want to transfer a subset of your custom code.

seg-source.mrk: <uicontrol>New Implementation</uicontrol> for using a new <pname conkeyref="loiob430775feaca45b7b4a868915c73b512/SAP-S4HANA"/> system in which you want to transfer a subset of your custom code.

target.mrk: <uicontrol>新实施</uicontrol>，用于使用您希望在其中传输自定义代码子集的新 <pname conkeyref="loiob430775feaca45b7b4a868915c73b512/SAP-S4HANA"/> 系统。

trans-unit.source: If this option is selected, <emphasis>no</emphasis> custom code is considered as <uicontrol>In Scope</uicontrol>. This means, you must select the custom code which you want to transfer to <pname conkeyref="loiob430775feaca45b7b4a868915c73b512/SAP-S4HANA"/>.

seg-source.mrk: If this option is selected, <emphasis>no</emphasis> custom code is considered as <uicontrol>In Scope</uicontrol>.
This means, you must select the custom code which you want to transfer to <pname conkeyref="loiob430775feaca45b7b4a868915c73b512/SAP-S4HANA"/>.

target.mrk: 如果选择此选项，<emphasis>不会</emphasis>将任何自定义代码视为<uicontrol>在范围内</uicontrol>。
这意味着，您必须选择您想要传输到 <pname conkeyref="loiob430775feaca45b7b4a868915c73b512/SAP-S4HANA"/> 的自定义代码。

trans-unit.source: Regardless of the selected transition scenario, you can adapt the scope in the <sap-technical-name translate="yes">Custom Code Migration</sap-technical-name> app.

seg-source.mrk: Regardless of the selected transition scenario, you can adapt the scope in the <sap-technical-name translate="yes">Custom Code Migration</sap-technical-name> app.

target.mrk: 无论选择哪种过渡场景，您都可以在<sap-technical-name translate="yes">自定义代码迁移</sap-technical-name>应用中调整范围。
